general.description: Another of the Proteron mining worlds, this world is largely mined by nanobots that the Proteron to send from space, and that suits them down to the ground.
general.bar: An orbital station, its quick orbit lets you see both the strip-mined and the forested areas of Delgon in a dizzying hour. There are a few engineers in the bar, supervising the performance of their bot swarms and algorithms.
